thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2nd visit & planning a 3rd
thread.title_full: 2nd visit & planning a 3rd - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Colm N
title: 2nd visit & planning a 3rd
text: Great hotel. Perfect location just a short stroll to Waterloo Station on one side & Westminster Bridge on the other. The rooms are very comfortable and the cleaning staff do a great job every day. The reception and restaurant staff are very helpful and friendly. Can't wait to go back
